actionCalls.description: Logs the account again after the field assignment has made changes to the account
actionCalls.name: Log_Account_After_Change
actionCalls.label: Log Account After Change

value.stringValue: Logging account again after Flow made a field update

actionCalls.description: Logs the input account records before any changes are made to the record in this Flow
actionCalls.name: Log_Account_Before_Changes
actionCalls.label: Log Account Before Changes

Flow.description:
An example process to demo logging Account records in Flow.
As an additional test, this Flow also has a really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really, really,
